title: Grant Proposal Template
description: A standard template for preparing research grant proposals according to KEMRI guidelines.

title: Budget Preparation Guide
description: Comprehensive guide to developing research budgets, including allowable expenses, cost sharing, and indirect costs.

title: Standard Operating Procedures for Grant Management
description: Detailed operating procedures for managing grants at KEMRI, from award notification to project closeout.

title: Research Collaboration Agreement Template
description: Template for establishing research collaborations with other institutions, including provisions for intellectual property and data sharing.

title: Grant Close-out Checklist
description: Checklist for ensuring all requirements are met when closing out a research grant, including financial reports, technical reports, and equipment disposition.

title: Funder Database
description: Comprehensive database of potential funding sources for health research, including contact information and funding priorities.

title: Data Management Plan Template
description: Template for developing a data management plan for research projects, covering data collection, storage, sharing, and long-term preservation.

title: Research Ethics Application Guide
description: Guide to preparing and submitting applications for ethical review of research involving human subjects.

title: Procurement Procedures for Grant-Funded Projects
description: Procedures for procuring goods and services using grant funds, ensuring compliance with funder requirements and institutional policies.

title: Annual Research Report Template
description: Template for preparing annual reports on research progress for funders and institutional review.
